SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Envelope
Envelope class for generating an envelope for a voice the envelope controls the amplitude of the voice over time
Filter
Filter class for filtering the audio signal using a state variable filter (low pass)
KeyboardController
KeyboardController handles mapping computer keyboard keys to MIDI notes and interfaces with the synthesizer to trigger notes.
OscType
Enum for oscillator types
Synth
Synth class for managing the synthesizer and its components
SynthUI
Handles the UI for the synthesizer application
SynthVoice
SynthVoice class for generating a single voice of the synthesizer extends UnitGenerator
